name: Lead
description: Potential customer showing initial interest in equipment rental services

attributes.name: Company Name
attributes.description: Legal company name of the potential customer
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 200 characters. No duplicates among active leads.
attributes.retentionPolicy: 12 months after last activity if not converted to customer
attributes.archivingRules: Anonymize company name and move to sales analytics archive after retention period

attributes.name: Contact Person
attributes.description: Name of primary contact at the lead organization
attributes.validationRules: Required. First and last name format. Max 100 characters.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Deleted when lead record is archived
attributes.archivingRules: Fully anonymized before archival

attributes.name: Contact Email
attributes.description: Primary email address of the contact person
attributes.validationRules: Required. Valid email format. Unique across active leads.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Deleted when lead record is archived
attributes.archivingRules: Fully removed, not archived, to comply with GDPR

attributes.name: Source
attributes.description: How the lead was acquired
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Website, Referral, Event, Cold Outreach, Partner.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with lead record for attribution analysis
attributes.archivingRules: Retained in anonymized form for sales channel analytics

attributes.name: Equipment Interest
attributes.description: Type of IT equipment the lead is interested in renting
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Free text. Max 500 characters.
attributes.archivingRules: Anonymized for product demand trending

attributes.name: Estimated Fleet Size
attributes.description: Estimated number of devices the lead may need to rent
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Positive integer between 1 and 10000.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for market analysis and capacity planning

name: Customer
description: Active or former customer with one or more signed rental contracts

attributes.name: Company Name
attributes.description: Legal company name of the customer
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 200 characters. Must match official trade register.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Active customer record plus 10 years after final contract termination
attributes.archivingRules: Archive to compliance storage for audit and legal retention requirements

attributes.name: Customer ID
attributes.description: Unique auto-generated customer identifier
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: CUS-YYYYMMDD-NNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent reference key while customer record exists
attributes.archivingRules: Retained as primary key in all archives for referential integrity

attributes.name: Industry
attributes.description: Industry classification of the customer organization
attributes.validationRules: Required. Enumerated values: Banking, Insurance, Retail, Healthcare, Manufacturing, Government, Education, Technology, Consulting, Other.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with customer record for reporting and segmentation
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for industry-based analytics and trend analysis

attributes.name: Account Manager
attributes.description: Employee assigned as primary account manager for this customer
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference active employee in be-employee. Updated when responsibility changes.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated with each reassignment; history maintained in audit log
attributes.archivingRules: Last assigned account manager retained in archive

attributes.name: Credit Rating
attributes.description: Internal credit assessment of customer payment reliability
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: A (Excellent), B (Good), C (Fair). Reassessed annually.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with customer record; updated on annual review or major payment events
attributes.archivingRules: Final credit rating retained for financial risk analysis

attributes.name: Payment Terms
attributes.description: Standard payment terms for customer invoices
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: 14d (14 days), 30d (30 days), 60d (60 days).
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with customer record; updated when terms negotiated
attributes.archivingRules: Final terms retained for financial analysis

name: Device
description: Individual piece of IT equipment managed for rental to customers

attributes.name: Serial Number
attributes.description: Manufacturer's unique serial number of the device
attributes.validationRules: Required. Unique across all devices. Max 50 characters. Immutable once created.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent while device is in inventory; retained 7 years after retirement
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with device history for audit trail and warranty tracking

attributes.name: Device Type
attributes.description: Category of IT equipment
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Notebook, Phone, Monitor, Accessory.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for asset type analytics and depreciation tracking

attributes.name: Manufacturer
attributes.description: Original equipment manufacturer name
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 100 characters. Standardized list of known manufacturers.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for warranty and support tracking

attributes.name: Model
attributes.description: Device model identifier from manufacturer
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 100 characters. Paired with manufacturer for uniqueness.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for technical specification and replacement part tracking

attributes.name: Purchase Date
attributes.description: Date the device was purchased or acquired
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Must be on or before current date.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for depreciation and warranty expiry calculations

attributes.name: Condition
attributes.description: Current physical and functional condition of the device
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: New, Good, Fair, Repair, Retired.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated with each maintenance event or inspection
attributes.archivingRules: Final condition retained for asset disposal documentation

attributes.name: Current Location
attributes.description: Where the device is currently located or deployed
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Warehouse, Customer, Transit, Maintenance.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated in real-time with device movements
attributes.archivingRules: Last known location retained for asset recovery procedures

attributes.name: Assigned Customer ID
attributes.description: Reference to customer currently renting this device, if applicable
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Must reference existing be-customer if populated. Null when not assigned.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated when assignment changes; history in rental orders
attributes.archivingRules: Customer assignment history retained for billing reconciliation

name: Product
description: Catalog entry for a type of IT equipment available for rental

attributes.name: Product Name
attributes.description: Commercial name of the product offering
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 150 characters. Unique within product category.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained while product is offered; 3 years after discontinuation
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with pricing and specification history for revenue analysis

attributes.name: Category
attributes.description: Product category for organizational purposes
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Notebook, Phone, Monitor, Accessory.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for portfolio analysis and market positioning

attributes.name: Manufacturer
attributes.description: Equipment manufacturer name
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 100 characters.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for vendor relationship and quality metrics

attributes.name: Monthly Rental Price
attributes.description: Standard monthly rental price in EUR
attributes.validationRules: Required. Currency: EUR. Positive value. Two decimal places.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Current price retained; historical prices maintained in audit log
attributes.archivingRules: Price history retained for revenue trend analysis

attributes.name: Specifications
attributes.description: Technical specifications and key features of the product
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Free text. Max 2000 characters.
attributes.archivingRules: Specifications history archived for obsolescence tracking

attributes.name: Availability Count
attributes.description: Total number of units currently available for rental
attributes.validationRules: Required. Non-negative integer. Real-time count of unassigned devices.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated in real-time with rental and return transactions
attributes.archivingRules: Daily snapshots retained for capacity planning analysis

name: Rental Order
description: Customer order for rental of one or more IT devices

attributes.name: Order ID
attributes.description: Unique order identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: ORD-YYYY-NNNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent with customer financial history for 10 years
attributes.archivingRules: Retained in compliance archive for audit and financial reconciliation

attributes.name: Customer ID
attributes.description: Reference to the customer placing this order
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-customer record.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain customer-order relationship integrity

attributes.name: Order Date
attributes.description: Date the order was placed
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Automatically set to current date.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for order history and timeline analysis

attributes.name: Requested Delivery Date
attributes.description: Date the customer requests delivery of rental equipment
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Must be after order date.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for delivery performance metrics

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current state of the order fulfillment lifecycle
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Draft, Confirmed, In Fulfillment, Shipped, Delivered, Cancelled.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Updated in real-time; final status retained with order
attributes.archivingRules: Order lifecycle retained for operations metrics

attributes.name: Total Monthly Value
attributes.description: Sum of monthly rental fees for all devices in this order in EUR
attributes.validationRules: Required. Currency: EUR. Calculated from ordered products. Non-negative.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for revenue reporting and customer lifetime value calculation

name: Rental Contract
description: Legally binding rental agreement between company and customer

attributes.name: Contract Number
attributes.description: Unique contract identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: RC-YYYY-NNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent. Retained 10 years after contract termination for legal compliance
attributes.archivingRules: Full contract document archived in secure compliance storage

attributes.name: Customer ID
attributes.description: Reference to the customer bound by this contract
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-customer record.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain contract-customer relationship

attributes.name: Start Date
attributes.description: Date the contract becomes effective
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Cannot be in the past at creation.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for contract lifecycle reporting

attributes.name: End Date
attributes.description: Date the contract expires or is terminated
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Must be after start date.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for contract duration analysis and renewal planning

attributes.name: Monthly Fee
attributes.description: Total monthly recurring fee in EUR under this contract
attributes.validationRules: Required. Currency: EUR. Positive value. Two decimal places.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with contract record; changes logged in amendment history
attributes.archivingRules: Fee history retained for revenue trend analysis

attributes.name: Payment Terms
attributes.description: Standard payment terms for invoices under this contract
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: 14d (14 days), 30d (30 days), 60d (60 days).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for cash flow and DSO analysis

attributes.name: Auto-Renewal
attributes.description: Whether contract automatically renews at end date
attributes.validationRules: Required. Boolean: true or false.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for renewal management and customer lifecycle analysis

attributes.name: SLA Tier
attributes.description: Service level agreement tier for this contract
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Basic, Standard, Premium.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with contract record; changes tracked in amendments
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for support quality metrics and service level compliance

name: Invoice
description: Billing document issued to customer for rental services

attributes.name: Invoice Number
attributes.description: Unique invoice identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: INV-YYYYMM-NNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent. Retained 10 years for tax and accounting compliance
attributes.archivingRules: Archived in finance system with full audit trail for tax authority requirements

attributes.name: Contract ID
attributes.description: Reference to the rental contract this invoice is billed under
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-rental-contract.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with invoice for contract linkage
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain invoice-contract traceability

attributes.name: Billing Period
attributes.description: Month/period for which this invoice is issued
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for period-based financial reporting

attributes.name: Amount
attributes.description: Total invoice amount in EUR including VAT
attributes.validationRules: Required. Currency: EUR. Positive value. Two decimal places.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for revenue recognition and financial statements

attributes.name: Due Date
attributes.description: Payment due date calculated from payment terms
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Calculated from invoice date + payment terms.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for aging analysis and DSO tracking

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current payment status of the invoice
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Draft, Sent, Paid, Overdue, Cancelled.
attributes.archivingRules: Final status retained for accounts receivable reporting

attributes.name: Payment Method
attributes.description: Method used or to be used for payment
attributes.validationRules: Required when status is Paid. One of: Bank Transfer, Direct Debit, Credit Card.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for payment method analytics and reconciliation

name: Delivery Order
description: Shipment order for delivery or return of rented equipment

attributes.name: Delivery ID
attributes.description: Unique delivery shipment identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: DEL-YYYY-NNNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained 3 years for logistics and customer service records
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with carrier and tracking information for logistics history

attributes.name: Order ID
attributes.description: Reference to the rental order this delivery fulfills
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-rental-order.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain order-delivery linkage

attributes.name: Pickup/Delivery Type
attributes.description: Type of delivery operation
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Delivery (new rental), Return (end of rental), Swap (equipment exchange).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for logistics operation type metrics

attributes.name: Scheduled Date
attributes.description: Date scheduled for delivery or pickup
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Must be on or after order date.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for on-time delivery metrics

attributes.name: Actual Date
attributes.description: Actual date delivery or pickup was completed
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Only populated after completion.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for delivery performance analytics

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current status of the delivery operation
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Planned, In Transit, Delivered, Failed.
attributes.archivingRules: Final status retained for operation outcome analysis

attributes.name: Carrier
attributes.description: Name of logistics carrier handling the shipment
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 100 characters. Standardized carrier list.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for carrier performance evaluation

name: Maintenance Record
description: Service record documenting maintenance, repair, or inspection of equipment

attributes.name: Record ID
attributes.description: Unique maintenance record identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: MNT-YYYY-NNNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained 7 years with device for warranty and liability purposes
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with device history for full equipment lifecycle documentation

attributes.name: Device Serial
attributes.description: Reference to the device being serviced
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-device by serial number.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain service history linkage

attributes.name: Type
attributes.description: Category of maintenance work performed
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Scheduled (preventive), Repair (corrective), Upgrade (enhancement), Inspection (quality check).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for maintenance type analytics and preventive maintenance tracking

attributes.name: Date
attributes.description: Date the maintenance work was performed
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for maintenance scheduling and device age analysis

attributes.name: Description
attributes.description: Detailed description of work performed and findings
attributes.validationRules: Required. Free text. Max 2000 characters.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for technical history and troubleshooting reference

attributes.name: Cost
attributes.description: Cost of maintenance work performed in EUR
attributes.validationRules: Required. Currency: EUR. Non-negative value. Two decimal places.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for cost analysis and ROI calculations

attributes.name: Technician
attributes.description: Employee who performed the maintenance work
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-employee.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for technician skill tracking and quality metrics

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current status of the maintenance work
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Open (pending), In Progress, Completed, Cancelled.
attributes.archivingRules: Final status retained for work completion metrics

name: Support Ticket
description: Customer support request for assistance with rental equipment or services

attributes.name: Ticket ID
attributes.description: Unique support ticket identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: TKT-YYYYMMDD-NNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained 3 years for customer service history
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with ticket conversations for customer service analytics

attributes.name: Customer ID
attributes.description: Reference to the customer reporting the issue
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-customer.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained to maintain customer-ticket relationship

attributes.name: Device Serial
attributes.description: Reference to affected device if issue is device-specific
attributes.validationRules: Optional. Must reference existing be-device if populated.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with ticket record if applicable
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for device-specific issue tracking

attributes.name: Priority
attributes.description: Urgency level for ticket resolution
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Low (72h SLA), Medium (24h SLA), High (4h SLA), Critical (1h SLA).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for SLA compliance reporting

attributes.name: Category
attributes.description: Type of support issue
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Hardware (device malfunction), Software (app/OS issue), Delivery (shipment problem), Billing (invoice/payment), General (other).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for issue category analytics and training needs

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Current resolution status of the ticket
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Open, In Progress, Waiting (for customer response), Resolved, Closed.
attributes.archivingRules: Final status retained for resolution metrics

attributes.name: Assigned To
attributes.description: Employee assigned to resolve this ticket
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-employee. Updated when reassigned.
attributes.archivingRules: Final assignee retained for resolution accountability

attributes.name: Resolution Time SLA
attributes.description: Target resolution time based on priority level
attributes.validationRules: Auto-calculated from priority. Format: Xh (hours) or Xd (days). Read-only.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for SLA compliance and performance tracking

name: Employee
description: Internal employee record for staff management and HR purposes

attributes.name: Employee ID
attributes.description: Unique employee identifier assigned at hiring
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: EMP-YYYYNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Permanent while employed; retained 10 years after termination
attributes.archivingRules: Archived with employment history for HR and tax records

attributes.name: Name
attributes.description: Full legal name of the employee
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 200 characters. First and last name.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained during employment and 10 years after termination
attributes.archivingRules: Retained in anonymized form for statistical HR analysis

attributes.name: Department
attributes.description: Reference to organizational department
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference valid department. Updated on transfer.
attributes.archivingRules: Department history retained for org structure tracking

attributes.name: Role
attributes.description: Job title or position of the employee
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 100 characters. From standardized role list.
attributes.archivingRules: Role history retained for career progression analysis

attributes.name: Start Date
attributes.description: Date the employee commenced employment
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Immutable once set.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for tenure and benefits calculations

attributes.name: Employment Type
attributes.description: Classification of employment arrangement
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Full-time, Part-time, Contract.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained with employee record; updated if status changes
attributes.archivingRules: Final employment type retained for severance calculations

name: Knowledge Article
description: Internal documentation and knowledge base article for process, training, and best practices

attributes.name: Article ID
attributes.description: Unique article identifier auto-generated at creation
attributes.validationRules: Auto-generated. Format: KA-YYYY-NNNNN. Unique and immutable.
attributes.retentionPolicy: Retained as long as article is published or 5 years if archived
attributes.archivingRules: Archived version history maintained for document control

attributes.name: Title
attributes.description: Article title or heading
attributes.validationRules: Required. Max 200 characters. Descriptive and searchable.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained in archive for document indexing

attributes.name: Category
attributes.description: Type of knowledge documented
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Process (documented workflows), Template (reusable forms), Best Practice (guidance), FAQ (common questions), Training (instructional).
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for content categorization

attributes.name: Author
attributes.description: Employee who created or owns the article
attributes.validationRules: Required. Must reference existing be-employee.
attributes.archivingRules: Retained for accountability and content ownership tracking

attributes.name: Last Updated
attributes.description: Date of the most recent update to the article
attributes.validationRules: Required. Format: YYYY-MM-DD. Auto-updated on edits.
attributes.archivingRules: Update history maintained for version control

attributes.name: Status
attributes.description: Publication and review status of the article
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: Draft (in progress), Published (available), Archived (obsolete).
attributes.archivingRules: Final status retained; published and archived versions retained

attributes.name: Access Level
attributes.description: Who can access this knowledge article
attributes.validationRules: Required. One of: All (company-wide), Department (specific department), Management (leadership only).
attributes.archivingRules: Access level retained to control archived content visibility
